text: @Yamiche @electreform Well since Arizona is going off the rails with Coronavirus and North Carolina isn't far behind  - sure, let's fill a confined space with a lot of people sitting close together & yelling.  What could go wrong? And before you say you don't care about them,  they all go to a town.
